taDuoc: Vi hạt đường 40 - 60 mesh, hypromellose, meglumin, poloxamer 188, natri lauryl sulfat, acid methacrylic-ethyl acrylat copolymer (1:1) dispersion 30%, triethyl citrat, glycerol monostearat 40-55, talc, natri hydroxyd, sillicified microcrystallin cellulose, starlac, hydroxypropyl cellulose, macrogol 6000, crospovidon, collooidal silica khan, magnesi stearar, opadry hồng 13G84577
